mapper.select: select d.deniedNo, d.projectNo projectNo, d.reason from denied d, project p, member m where d.projectNo=p.projectNo and p.memberNo=m.memberNo and m.memberNo=#{memberNo} and d.firstview=0
mapper.update: update denied set firstview=1 where projectNo=#{projectNo}
mapper.select: select reason from denied where projectNo=#{projectNo}
